name: Cauliflower Patties
author: CleanHealthandFitness
summary: This is a healthy and filling side dish for any meal.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed
directions: Bring water to boil in a saucepan
Add cauliflower; boil until tender, about 15 minutes
Strain cauliflower, transfer to a bowl, and mash with a fork
Stir almond flour, eggs, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper into cauliflower until well-combined; form into 1/4-cup sized patties
Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Fry patties in a single layer until golden brown, about 5 minutes per side
Repeat with remaining patties and olive oil
